subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Stepan had not scored since Nov. 23, when the Rangers were seemingly invincible at 16-3-2, before a long skid. But he fueled his team from his first shift against Dallas.
snippet: Stepan had not scored since Nov. 23, when the Rangers were seemingly invincible at 16-3-2, before a long skid. But he fueled his team from his first shift against Dallas.
